item.title: The Book of Mormon—Keystone of Our Religion
item.description:
The Book of Mormon—Keystone of Our Religion by President Ezra Taft Benson, President of the Church given in the Saturday Morning session of the 156th Semiannual General Conference on Tue Sep 30 1986
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: President Ezra Taft Benson, President of the Church
